description:
Gao and friends head to Los Angeles for the WBC Cup World Championships! Kyoya makes a surprise appearance as a competitor, as does the mysterious J Genesis. In the first match of the first round, Kyoya unfurls his new flag: the powerful Dragon Zwei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Here it Comes x3! WBC Cup World Championships!
Kita Kita Kitaaa! WBC Cup Sekai Taikai!!
キタキタキタァー! WBCカップ世界大会!!
